title: Rclone Crashes on panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
Howdy, I'm having a similar problem. I am running the rclone version from [here.](https://github.com/ncw/rclone/issues/459#issuecomment-215465624) I'm running Ubuntu 15.10 64 bit with 16GB of RAM and trying to upload to Google Drive. I tried using the patch to no avail. If I run 

```
 $ sudo rclone --drive-chunk-size=256M copy /backup-20160504.tar.gz.gpg remote:Backups
```

I get the following error

```
sudo rclone --drive-chunk-size=256M -v copy /backup-20160504.tar.gz.gpg remote:Backups
2016/05/05 19:59:20 backup-20160504.tar.gz.gpg: Failed to stat /home/cameron/backup-20160504.tar.gz.gpg: lstat /home/cameron/backup-20160504.tar.gz.gpg: no such file or directory
2016/05/05 19:59:21 Google drive root 'Backups': Modify window is 1ms
2016/05/05 19:59:21 Google drive root 'Backups': Building file list
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x40 pc=0x4dcfcd]

goroutine 37 [running]:
panic(0xae9fc0, 0xc8200140f0)
    /usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:481 +0x3e6
github.com/ncw/rclone/fs.readFilesMap(0x7f055e3a1e78, 0xc8201111a0, 0x0, 0x0)
    /home/ncw/Code/Go/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/operations.go:463 +0x17d
github.com/ncw/rclone/fs.syncCopyMove.func2(0xc8201b0048, 0x7f055e3a1e78, 0xc8201111a0, 0xc820449ea0, 0xc82046e420)
    /home/ncw/Code/Go/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/operations.go:522 +0x42
created by github.com/ncw/rclone/fs.syncCopyMove
    /home/ncw/Code/Go/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/operations.go:528 +0x2be
```

However if change directories to `/` and run the following command

```
$ sudo rclone --drive-chunk-size=256M -v copy backup-20160504.tar.gz.gpg remote:Backups
```

then it works, just with speeds alternative between 2000 kBytes/s and 0 kBytes/s.

